posts.post_content: Djinn is good. I got him at a pre-release and he definitely works well....in a draft. Paying 5 for a 4/4 with flying and an ability is fine. My problem is that the ability costs 4 to play. In most cases, you're paying more for the spell than its actual mana cost. And what if you can't play the card? Well, too bad, its exiled. Personally, I think he's overrated.
posts.html:
Djinn is good. I got him at a pre-release and he definitely works well....in a draft. Paying 5 for a 4/4 with flying and an ability is fine. My problem is that the ability costs 4 to play. In most cases, you're paying more for the spell than its actual mana cost. And what if you can't play the card? Well, too bad, its exiled. Personally, I think he's overrated.

posts.post_content:
I like how the symbol on his head is similar to Yawgmoth's.  
  
Also, to JonnyPhoenyx ,unless you had some random, nonsense mana-accel in a deck with blue and black, you wouldnt get Bolas out on Turn 5 with it, because youd need 9 mana to play the djinn and use his ability.  
  
But I do like the idea of using him with Liliana.
